name: market for sugar refinery | sugar refinery | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/6356/documentation

This is a market activity. In the case of services or immobile infrastructures, markets are connecting suppliers and consumers at a global level. For specific connections at regional level, direct links between the local producing activities and the local consumers are preferred. Transport or losses are logically not relevant for this type of products.;This is the market for  'sugar refinery', in the Global geography.;This market contains no transport or losses, as they are irrelevant for the delivered product.;This is an immobile infrastructure, representing the construction of a sugar refinery. The infrastructure represents a a typical sugar refinery with a production capacity of 200,000 tons sugar per year and a lifetime of a 50 years. The equivalent feed capacities vary from 1,300 kt/yr for sugar beets to 1,650 kt/yr for sugarcane. The process includes land use, building materials, their decommission but it excludes energy use for construction.

This activity starts with the built infrastructure ready to use.

This activity ends with the infrastructure made accessible to the users. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
category: F:Construction/42:Civil engineering/429:Construction of other civil engineering projects/4290:Construction of other civil engineering projects
tags: Sector: Infrastructure & Machinery; Agriculture & Animal Husbandry
